Privacy Policy

Last updated: Sep 2025

Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our Facebook Video Downloader service.

Information We Collect

Personal Information

We collect minimal personal information to provide our service effectively:

  • Usage Data: Information about how you use our service, including video URLs you submit for downloading
  • Technical Data: Browser type, operating system, IP address, and device information
  • Contact Information: Email address (only if you choose to contact us for support)

Non-Personal Information

We also collect anonymous, non-personal information:

  • Download statistics and service usage patterns
  • Website performance metrics and error logs
  • Geographic location data (country/region level only)

How We Use Your Information

Service Provision

We use your information to:

  • Process video download requests and provide download links
  • Improve our service functionality and user experience
  • Respond to your support requests and inquiries
  • Ensure service security and prevent abuse

Service Improvement

Anonymous data helps us:

  • Analyze usage patterns to enhance our downloader
  • Identify and fix technical issues
  • Optimize website performance and loading speeds
  • Develop new features based on user needs

Information Sharing and Disclosure

We Do Not Sell Your Data

We are committed to protecting your privacy and will never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

Limited Sharing

We may share information only in these specific circumstances:

  • Legal Requirements: When required by law or to comply with legal processes
  • Service Providers: With trusted third-party services that help us operate our website (hosting, analytics)
  • Security: To protect against fraud, abuse, or security threats
  • Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

Third-Party Services

Our service may use third-party services for:

  • Website analytics and performance monitoring
  • Content delivery and hosting services
  • Security and fraud prevention

These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.

Data Security

Security Measures

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

  • Encryption: All data transmission is encrypted using SSL/TLS protocols
  • Access Controls: Strict access controls limit who can access your data
  • Regular Audits: We regularly review and update our security practices
  • Data Minimization: We only collect the minimum data necessary for our service

Data Retention

We retain your information only as long as necessary:

  • Video URLs: Processed immediately and not stored permanently
  • Downloaded Files: Automatically deleted after a short period
  • Usage Logs: Retained for up to 30 days for service improvement
  • Contact Information: Kept only while providing support

Your Privacy Rights

Access and Control

You have the right to:

  • Access: Request information about what data we have about you
  • Correction: Request correction of inaccurate personal information
  • Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
  • Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
  • Objection: Object to certain types of data processing

How to Exercise Your Rights

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us through our Contact Us page. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide a better user experience.

How We Use Cookies

We use cookies for:

  • Essential Cookies: Required for basic website functionality
  • Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
  • Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
  • Security Cookies: Help protect against fraud and abuse

Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

Children's Privacy

Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

International Users

Our service is accessible worldwide. If you are accessing our service from outside your country of residence, please note that your information may be transferred to and processed in countries with different privacy laws.

GDPR Compliance

For users in the European Union, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and provide additional rights and protections as outlined in this policy.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes by:

  • Posting the updated policy on this page
  • Updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy
  • Sending email notifications for significant changes (if you've provided your email)

We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

Email Support

For privacy-related inquiries:

Contact Us
Data Protection

To exercise your privacy rights:

Request Data

Legal Basis for Processing

We process your personal information based on the following legal grounds:

  • Consent: When you explicitly agree to our data processing
  • Contract Performance: To provide our video downloading service
  • Legitimate Interest: To improve our service and prevent abuse
  • Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

Data Breach Procedures

In the unlikely event of a data breach that affects your personal information, we will:

  • Immediately investigate and contain the breach
  • Notify affected users within 72 hours (where required by law)
  • Report the incident to relevant authorities if necessary
  • Take steps to prevent future breaches
  • Provide guidance on protective measures you can take

Your Privacy Matters

We are committed to protecting your privacy and providing a secure, transparent service. If you have any concerns about your privacy or our practices, please don't hesitate to contact us.
